entry.title: Financial Market Applications of LLMs | The Gradient
entry.summary: The AI revolution drove frenzied investment in both private and public companies and captured the public‚Äôs imagination in 2023. Transformational consumer products like ChatGPT are powered by Large Lan...
entry.content: The AI revolution drove frenzied investment in both private and public companies and captured the public‚Äôs imagination in 2023. Transformational consumer products like ChatGPT are powered by Large Language Models (LLMs) that excel at modeling sequences of tokens that represent words or parts of words [2]. Amazingly, structural
